text.section: An individual may not operate for hire a limousine designed to carry 15 or fewer individuals, including the driver, unless the individual holds a valid for-hire driver's license issued by the Public Service Commission.

A person may not allow an individual to operate for hire a limousine designed to carry 15 or fewer individuals, including the driver, unless:
The individual operating the limousine holds a valid for-hire driver's license issued by the Public Service Commission; and
The limousine displays special limousine vehicle registration plates issued under § 13-939 of this article.
